column4: so I have a few older boxes that I am debating installing Ubuntu server on....one would be a development server for my web projects in PHP or RoR, the other would be a subversion server
so do you all think I'm making the right decision on Ubuntu server for this
Anyone in here use Ubuntu Server??
i don't know...i'm just starting to look into Ubuntu...so probably
healot:  do you think it is a good server system then...I couldn't find many details...does it use a gui
healot:  i don't have one...I just want opinions from people who use it
healot...that's what I thought and good with me
if it's like Debian Stable it probably is an excellent server OS
Edlin:  yea that is what I was going with...i think I'm going to do an install tomorrow
using Ubuntu rather than Debian will give you some nice things like PHP5 without using a third party repository.
but otherwise I'd lean towards Debian
Edlin:  the other reason I was looking this direction
I want the PHP5 and such
i have used debian servers and don't care about the 3rd party repositories but still
Ubuntu Dapper LTS has a long support cycle too, if that's an issue.
probably not too much but always nice to know
